articles.title: Kate, Princess of Wales: I am having cancer treatment - BBC.com
articles.description: Kate releases video message saying she is having preventative chemotherapy after cancer was found in tests.

articles.author: Seth Abramovitch
articles.title: Jeffrey Jones Not in ‘Beetlejuice Beetlejuice,’ Despite Easter Egg - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actor, who played Winona Ryder's dad in the 1988 original, can be seen fleetingly on a headstone in the sequel's new trailer.
articles.content:
Will Jeffrey Jones appear in Tim Burton‘s hugely anticipated Beetlejuice sequel, Beetlejuice Beetlejuice?
That’s the question on the mind of eagle-eyed fans of the upcoming Warner Bros. film’s trail… [+1806 chars]

articles.title: Netflix’s 3 Body Problem: The science explained by an astrophysicist - Vox.com
articles.description: Netflix’s new adaptation of Liu Cixin’s famous sci-fi series shows us what quantum mechanics might look like in real time.
